name: daily-quote-extension
description: A Chrome extension that displays daily inspirational quotes

scripts.release:patch: pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run sync-version && pnpm run build:extension
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run sync-version && pnpm run build:extension
scripts.release:major: pnpm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run sync-version && pnpm run build:extension
